name: Abducting Mjolnir
description:
Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move Grooby.
  • R to reset the current level.

Mjölnir will strike lightning every time it is turned or spun around.

Use this power to destroy crates and charge up the ship.

Background:

After defeating Thor, Lord of Thunder, Grooby the alien must drag Mjölnir  (Thor's magic lightning hammer) around his ship. 

Help him navigate, repair, collect tools and power-up his ship so he can get back home.

You will find buttons and doors in later stages. Both Grooby and Mjölnir can be used to activate these buttons. However, Mjölnir's lightning can not penetrate these doors while they are closed.

Be careful not to destroy the important parts/tools you need or to get trapped behind locked doors!

Join Grooby on his Great, Grand, Galivanting Adventure through 37 wacky levels!
